fields.summary: Replace new euca-(de)register-* commands with single euca-(de)register-service commands

fields.description:
*Assessment*

euca_conf doesn't contain the \-\-register-* option for key cloud components.  Here are the current registration options:
{code}
# euca_conf --help | grep register
  --no-rsync            Don't use rsync when registering.
  --no-scp              Don't use scp when registering.
  --register-service    Add a new service in EUCALYPTUS. See also --list-
  --deregister-service  Remove an existing service from EUCALYPTUS. See also
                        Used with --register-service & --deregister-service.
                        Used with --register-service
                        Used with --register-service.
                        Used with --register-service & --deregister-service.
                        Set port used by a service when registering.
  --register-nodes="host host..."
  --deregister-nodes="host host..."
  --no-sync             Used with --register-* to skip syncing
{code}

On 3.4.2, euca_conf contained the following \-\-register-* options:
{code}
$ euca_conf --help | grep register
  --no-rsync            Don't use rsync when registering.
  --no-scp              Don't use scp when registering.
  --register-nodes="host host..."
  --deregister-nodes="host host..."
  --register-arbitrator
  --deregister-arbitrator
  --register-cloud      Add new clc to EUCALYPTUS.
  --deregister-cloud    Remove clc from EUCALYPTUS.
  --register-cluster    Add new cluster to EUCALYPTUS.
  --deregister-cluster  Remove cluster from EUCALYPTUS.
  --register-walrus     Add new walrus to EUCALYPTUS.
  --deregister-walrus   Remove walrus from EUCALYPTUS.
  --register-sc         Add new storage controller to EUCALYPTUS.
  --deregister-sc       Remove storage controller from EUCALYPTUS.
  --register-vmwarebroker
  --deregister-vmwarebroker
  --list-walruses       List registered walrus(es).
  --list-clouds         List registered CLCs.
  --list-clusters       List registered CCs.
  --list-arbitrators    List registered arbitrators.
  --list-vmwarebrokers  List registered VMware brokers.
  --list-nodes          List registered NCs.
  --list-scs            List registered SCs.
  --no-sync             Used with --register-* to skip syncing
                        Used with --register-* & --deregister-*.
                        Used with --register-*.
                        Used with --register-* & --deregister-*.
  --help-register       Display help on register/deregister.
{code}

*Pertinent Data*

* Version of Eucalyptus:
{code}
eucalyptus-osg-4.0.0-0.0.1000.20140507gitfd164b1b.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-4.0.0-0.0.1000.20140507gitfd164b1b.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-common-java-libs-4.0.0-0.0.1000.20140507gitfd164b1b.el6.x86_64
euca2ools-3.1.0-0.0.180.20140508git70a0a597.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-admin-tools-4.0.0-0.0.1000.20140507gitfd164b1b.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-walrus-4.0.0-0.0.1000.20140507gitfd164b1b.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image-1.0.0-0.165.140507git9127d5a.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-common-java-4.0.0-0.0.1000.20140507gitfd164b1b.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-cloud-4.0.0-0.0.1000.20140507gitfd164b1b.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-load-balancer-image-1.0.4-0.199.140505git81659ff.el6.x86_64
{code}
fields.summary: euca_conf no longer shows --register options for key components

comments.body:
Fixed in commit {{d08c9d9}}

{noformat}
Usage: euca_conf [options]

Options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --initialize          Do one-time initialize of CLC.
  --heartbeat=host      Get heartbeat data for <host>.
  --synckey             
  --no-rsync            Don't use rsync when registering.
  --no-scp              Don't use scp when registering.
  --skip-scp-hostcheck  Skip scp interactive host keycheck.
  --get-credentials=<zipfile>
                        Download credentials to <zipfile>.
                        By default, the admin credentials
                        will be downloaded but this can be
                        adjusted with the --cred-user option.
                        Each time this is called, new X.509
                        certificates will be created for the
                        specified user.
  --cred-account=<accountname>
                        Set get-credentials account.
  --cred-user=<username>
                        Set get-credentials user.
  --register-service    Add a new service in EUCALYPTUS. See also --list-
                        service-types.
  --deregister-service  Remove an existing service from EUCALYPTUS. See also
                        --list-services.
  -T <service type>, --service-type=<service type>
                        Type of the service.
                        Used with --register-service & --deregister-service.
  -P <partition name>, --partition=<partition name>
                        Name of partition.
                        Used with --register-service
  -H <host name or ip>, --host=<host name or ip>
                        Name or IP address of host.
                        Used with --register-service.
  -N <service name>, --service-name=<service name>
                        Name of service.
                        Used with --register-service & --deregister-service.
  --list-services       List current status of Eucalyptus services.
  --service-port=<port>
                        Set port used by a service when registering.
  --register-nodes="host host..."
                        Add node controllers to a cluster controller.
  --deregister-nodes="host host..."
                        Remove node controllers from a cluster controller.
  --register-cloud      Add a cloud controller.
  --deregister-cloud    Remove a cloud controller.
  --register-cluster    Add a cluster controller.
  --deregister-cluster  Remove a cluster.
  --register-walrusbackend
                        Add a walrus back end.
  --deregister-walrusbackend
                        Remove a walrus back end.
  --register-sc         Add a storage controller.
  --deregister-sc       Remove a storage controller.
  --register-vmwarebroker
                        Add a VMware broker.
  --deregister-vmwarebroker
                        Remove a VMware broker.
  --list-walrusbackends
                        List registered walrus back ends.
  --list-clouds         List registered cloud controllers.
  --list-clusters       List registered cluster controllers.
  --list-vmwarebrokers  List registered VMware brokers.
  --list-scs            List registered storage controllers.
  --list-nodes          List registered node controllers.
  --no-sync             Do not sync keys when registering a component.
  --debug               Enable debug output
  --debugger            Enable interactive debugger on error.
  --version             Display version string
{noformat}

[~gholms],

Confirmed this to be fixed:

{code}
[root@odc-d-06-07 hspencer]# euca_conf --help | grep register
  --no-rsync            Don't use rsync when registering.
  --no-scp              Don't use scp when registering.
  --register-service    Add a new service in EUCALYPTUS.
  --deregister-service  Remove an existing service from EUCALYPTUS. See also
                        Used with --register-service & --deregister-service.
                        Used with --register-service
                        Used with --register-service.
                        Used with --register-service & --deregister-service.
                        Set port used by a service when registering.
  --register-nodes="host host..."
  --deregister-nodes="host host..."
  --register-cloud      Add a cloud controller.
  --deregister-cloud    Remove a cloud controller.
  --register-cluster    Add a cluster controller.
  --deregister-cluster  Remove a cluster.
  --register-walrusbackend
  --deregister-walrusbackend
  --register-sc         Add a storage controller.
  --deregister-sc       Remove a storage controller.
  --register-vmwarebroker
  --deregister-vmwarebroker
                        List registered walrus back ends.
  --list-clouds         List registered cloud controllers.
  --list-clusters       List registered cluster controllers.
  --list-vmwarebrokers  List registered VMware brokers.
  --list-scs            List registered storage controllers.
  --list-nodes          List registered node controllers.
  --no-sync             Do not sync keys when registering a component.
{code}

*Version*
{code}
# euca-version
euca2ools 3.1.0-pre3-82-g6274212 (Omega)
eucalyptus 4.0.0
{code}
